name: The Final Days: I'm Still Alive
description: Text based survival game. Can you discover the reason for the chaos plaguing the world? Can you survive? Will you be a nice guy? Or a total douche? Is your call.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher. Processor: Anything that uses electricity. Graphics: A toaster Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Runs on a potato with cables.
